name: HOLD THE CHEESE!
description:
OVERVIEW

Play as an employee in an office having a terribly uncontrollably gassy day. Avoid coworkers and control your farts to make it through!

CONTROLS

Use ARROW KEYS or WASD to move around and SPACE to hold in a fart at the right timing. The more you hold it in, the smellier your fart will be. If a coworker smells your fart, you lose.

CREDITS AND CONTACT

Created by Austin Shyu: @shyupuff or Send me an Email!

Art Advising (and generally tons of help) from Brian Tsai: DeviantArt

You may need to download the Unity WebPlayer to play this game:  Download!

Made with Unity, Photoshop, Soundbible, Audacity
